references.paper_title: Imagen Video: High definition video generation with diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the current work, introducing high-definition video generation using diffusion models which is directly built upon in the current work.

references.paper_title: Progressive distillation for fast sampling of diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is crucial as it introduces the concept of diffusion step distillation, a key technique used for accelerating the video generation process.

references.paper_title: On distillation of guided diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is significant because it provides a distillation approach specifically for classifier-free guided diffusion models, directly relevant to the efficiency improvements sought in the current research.

references.paper_title: Emu Video: Factorizing text-to-video generation by explicit image conditioning
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant due to its focus on simplifying the video generation task, an approach conceptually similar to the factorization method proposed in the current work.

references.paper_title: EM distillation for one-step diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is important as it proposes a different method of diffusion step distillation that leads to high-quality image generation with minimal sampling steps, providing an alternative approach to consider.
